biotools.summary: Fibromine is a multi-omics database and mining tool for target discovery in pulmonary fibrosis. It is a Shiny-powered application for fibrosis-related data integration and mining aiming to the acceleration of pulmonary fibrosis research.

bioschemas.name: Fibromine
